EmailTemplate.subject: Tottenham Hotspur UK Camp - Presented by The British International School of Kuala Lumpur
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.Salutation} {!Contact.FirstName} {!Contact.LastName},
Our sister school in Malaysia, The British School of Kuala Lumpur, has extended an invitation to students from BSG to join them in a football camp to be organised this summer in cooperation with Tottenham Hotspur Football Club.
Details, including registration forms, schedules and background information of the organisers of this football camp are attached to this email. If you require further information, please contact Emma Cleary (emma.cleary@britishschool.edu.my), the coordinator from the British School of Kuala Lumpur.
Kind regards,
Administration Team The British School of Guangzhou +8620 8709 4788 www.bsg.org.cn
